divs: sighting detailsi was out at night(fri-feb-8th-2008) to take pictures of our old large tree. we captured some strange things on film on our sony digital camera. the last picture i took that night, was a face of an alien with open mouth. i have no idea why it looks green what's going on? when i took the photo and looked at it briefly on the camera, i thought it was an apparition of a soldier with an army helmut. then when i uploaded the photo to my computer, i saw what looked like a green alien face with very large eyes and mouth open. looks like i just caught the right half of it's face and torso. i think the flashes of many pictures attracted it, then when it came closer, the first smaller flash startled it,it opened it's mouth in a panick then the main big flash caught that site\expression.(back in the summer of aug-07, i had an encounter with a very large star-light craft, that flew silently over the huge tree on my street right in front of my house, i waved\flagged it down, it came towards me very low to the ground and i ran towards it, my friend came out of the house and towards me, the craft saw him approach and it took off the other direction going east of orillia,ont,canada. since then,nothing has happened,that i know of..there were however pictures in the local newspaper of crafts the week before i saw mine.) when i took my photo's, i made sure i held my breath when i took each shot. there was no smoke,bright lights or fog around. this photo is just one of 4 amazing pictures that really need to be checked out by professionals. what do you think this is? the second shot was taken the night before by my 14 year old daughter. if you lighten the exposure,you clearly see a skeletal being with it's head turned. there is a spine and neck,head,face and either wings or shoulders. please take a look and let me know what you think? thankyou. ms.t.b
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Orillia

This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: caught a picture of an alien being face and torso
